name: JP Lab
author: Andrew Hanson (Path Set) & Joop van der Linden

modules.name: Four Track
modules.description: Program 4-voice melodies or chords. Add endless expanders for endless length.
modules.keywords: melody 1v/oct v/oct volt per ocatve note pool four tracks chords

modules.name: Four Track Expander
modules.description: Add 64 more note blocks to Four Track. Try using more than one.

modules.name: Improv
modules.description: Jazz inspired live performance sequencer. Responds instantly to changes in notes add through the keyboard.
modules.keywords: melody 1v/oct v/oct volt per ocatve keyboard note pool instrument

modules.name: Star Matrix
modules.description: Fully control transition chance between any note block.
modules.keywords: melody 1v/oct v/oct volt per ocatve note pool matrix transition weights

modules.name: Counter Point Expander
modules.description: Expander for any main JP sequencer. Creates an extra voice using delay, regression and inversion.

modules.name: Navigator
modules.description: An event sequencer of 16 steps, each with two gates and two CVs. Precisely control the length of each event or add randomness.
